response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us at $1,500,000. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would also be a valuable addition to your collection or business. To make this opportunity more appealing, I am offering you the chance to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,400,000. This represents a significant saving compared to our standard pricing and could be a great investment for you. Kindly let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 1400000}
